scripts.release:linux: yarn run release:angular && yarn run build:electron && yarn run release:build
scripts.release:win: yarn run release:angular && yarn run build:electron
scripts.build: yarn run build:angular && yarn run build:electron
scripts.electron: yarn install && cd app/electron && yarn run build:dev
scripts.outdated: cd app/angular && yarn run outdated && cd ../electron && yarn run outdated
scripts.postinstall: cd app/angular && yarn install && cd ../electron && yarn install
